And geography and yes biology( it gives me criples cuz I hate seeing organs ,by eye which u totally know why I hate it) Remaining they i ricked it like hell Approx got a out off (almost got a 80/80) physics and chemistry and maths even commerce and loved English. But it was hell alot tougher Then I realised I love physics and chemistry (chemistry more cuz we can end it by one word and physics cuz it's more logical) Now I decided after the pandemic we are having complete the other board exams (2020 covid -19 pandemic)   U gotta say chemistry and physics were alot logical this year and I never seen a previous year paper this hard (meaning not stright forwardor u can say time consuming or hard to think ) I got to know this by seeing the faces of my friends after exams lol 😂  Image sources : google Oh by the way I chose H/C cuz I got VERY less marks First get to know which field are u better at (i am not talking about subjects) which way u read and study smarter or harder choose the subjects and take your leap of faith WISELY my friend Signing off

As i am in my last semester of BBA. i’d suggest you to take: Business Ethics: this will teach you all the ethics you will require in futureEconomics: this will teach you how the economy of a country worksConsumer Behaviour: this will teach you when and how to target your market by keeping the behaviour of your consumer and it also give marketer informationPsychology: this will teach you about human behaviour as this is the most important part of studying and doing business. You have to understand the person infront of you.Advertising: this will teach you how you can promote your business and advertise it. (This subject is my favourite although my specialization is marketing)And Accounting: this will simply teach you how to manage your own cash flow because at times you cannot trust even your family member with the money.Your main focus should be getting knowledge. GET KNOWLEDGE AS MUCH AS YOU CAN AND FROM WHERE EVER YOU CAN.
